title: The Law Speaks to You (+Weird, Requires Holding and Laws)
description: When someone breaks your laws, roll+Weird.

outcomes.text: The Law allows you to choose:
bullets: You let them off with a warning, reduced penalty, or reprieve.
You make an exception for them and they have no blame.
They must face the full penalty.

outcomes.text: The MC tells you which the Law will allow.
Responsibility falls to you, and you must pay the penalty yourself. You may choose to pay it in full, in reduced form, or only symbolically.

title: Ears in the Walls (+Sharp, Requires Holding and Laws)
description: At the beginning of the session, roll+Sharp.

outcomes.text: Hold 3. During the session. Spend your hold 1 for 1 to
bullets: Name a person who's living in or visiting your holding, and ask: *what they're up to right now*. The MC or the other player has to answer frankly

title: Forbidding Presence (+Cool)
description: When you enter into a nonviolent situation, roll+Cool.

bullets: If anyone here **has** broken your laws or betrayed your holding, they can't meet your eyes. Ask the MC who can't.
If anyone here **intends** to break your laws or intends you harm, they move involuntarily away from you. Ask the MC who does.

outcomes.text: If you have any enemies here, they panic and immediately move against you.

title: Right Hand
description: You have a lieutenant who isn't just competent and loyal, they are, as the saying goes, *reliable*. Detail them now with the MC.

title: Taskmaster
description: When you give orders to a non-gang body of people who answer to you (eg your holding's population, your followers, your assistants or crew) use **Leadership**, even though they're not a gang.

title: Improvements
description: Choose 2 Lawmaker moves. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.
pick: Get a move from an unused playbook
Get a move from an unused playbook

title: Improvements
description: You get the law speaks to you, and choose 1 more Lawmaker move. Your gang gives you leadership and your holding gives you wealth. A holding option might give you behind the wheel as well. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.
pick: Add an option and a surplus to your holding
Add an option and a surplus to your holding
Add an option to your holding and erase a want
